title: Trek aims for a gravel World Championship with race focused Checkpoint SLR, plus SL and ALR models
content:
Now that gravel racing is fully recognized by the UCI (for better or worse), riders and manufacturers are scrambling to claim that first-ever gravel rainbow jersey.
